short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With one click, consolidate all Chrome tabs into a single window and remove duplicate tabs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
NEW Features:
--> Removes duplicate tabs 
--> Moves all tab groups to the left in current window (to the right of any pinned tabs)
--> Auto-collapses all tab groups

Bug Fixes (with v 1.1.0 and newer versions):
--> Pinned tabs remain pinned when moved to current window
--> Grouped tabs remain grouped when moved to current window
